episode.title: Citizens Against Rent Control/Coalition for Fair Housing v. City of Berkeley, California

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in Citizens against Rent Control Coalition for Fair Housing against the City of Berkeley.

And for reason stated in the opinion of the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the California Supreme Court is reversed and the case is remanded to that Court for proceedings not inconsistent with the opinion of this Court.
Justice Rehnquist filed a concurring opinion.
Justices Marshall, Blackmun, and O'Connor have filed opinions concurring in the judgment. Justice White filed a dissenting opinion.
